thread.section_title: Kerry Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best ROI
thread.title_full: Best ROI - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: muzhil
title: Best ROI
text:
Kerry has a great location near the biz center in BJ.
The hotel is run by Shangrila so you can guarantee a good service.
Price is great, $150 or lower so it is definitely affordable for low budget biz travel.
Finally, the minibar is free. It has coke, beer, juice, etc...
I stayed here every time I travel to BJ. Highly recommended!
